title: Champion select not popping up and neither are masteries
body: Just wondering if this is happening to anyone else. Like the title says my masteries won't show when I select that tab and when I go into a match the champion select screen won't come up. Is there anything to fix this?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time reaching the servers these two items reside on. Problematic network configurations are the most common cause for this to happen, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if that resolves your issue.
